db_password.desc: Must match MYSQL_PASSWORD in .env - used by all services
db_password.label: Database Password

db_user.desc: Must match MYSQL_USER in .env - used by all services
db_user.label: Database Username

golbat_api_secret.desc: Must match across configs - Dragonite/ReactMap use this to request data from Golbat
golbat_api_secret.label: Golbat API Secret

golbat_raw_secret.desc: Must match across configs - Dragonite uses this to SEND data to Golbat
golbat_raw_secret.label: Golbat Raw Bearer

koji_secret.desc: Must match KOJI_SECRET in .env - used to access Koji geofences
koji_secret.label: Koji Bearer Token

rotom_device_secret.desc: Devices use this to authenticate with Rotom
rotom_device_secret.label: Device Auth Secret

token_refresh_only.desc: Only use accounts with valid cached tokens
token_refresh_only.label: Token Refresh Only

login_delay.desc: Seconds between PTC logins (120=safe, lower=faster but riskier)
login_delay.label: PTC Login Delay

remote_auth_url.desc: Auth service specifically for PTC accounts
remote_auth_url.label: PTC Auth URL

token_refresh_only.desc: Only use accounts with valid cached tokens (safer)
token_refresh_only.label: Token Refresh Only

db.dragonite.desc: Database for Dragonite accounts and settings

pool_size.desc: Number of database connections to maintain
pool_size.label: Pool Size

db.dragonite.title: 🗄️ Dragonite Database

api_host.desc: Network address to listen on (0.0.0.0 = all interfaces)
api_host.label: API Host

api_port.desc: Port for web interface and API (Docker maps externally)
api_port.label: API Port

login_delay.desc: Seconds between account logins on same proxy (0=no delay, higher=safer)
login_delay.label: Login Delay

remote_auth_url.desc: Xilriws login helper URL for Pokemon GO authentication
remote_auth_url.label: Auth Service URL

koji.desc: Connection to Koji for scan area definitions

url.desc: Internal Docker address of Koji service
url.label: Koji URL

koji.title: 🗺️ Koji Geofence Connection

save.desc: Write logs to files (needed for Blissey stats)
save.label: Save Logs

golbat_api_secret.desc: Password to REQUEST data from Golbat
golbat_api_secret.label: Golbat API Secret

golbat_endpoint.desc: Golbat HTTP address for sending data
golbat_endpoint.label: Golbat HTTP

golbat_raw_bearer.desc: Password to SEND raw data to Golbat
golbat_raw_bearer.label: Golbat Raw Bearer

enabled.desc: Send stats to Prometheus (needed for Grafana)
enabled.label: Enable Metrics

rotom.desc: Connection to Rotom for device management
rotom.title: 📱 Rotom Device Manager

tuning.desc: Control how aggressively accounts are used

minimum_account_reuse_hours.desc: Hours an account must rest before reuse (72=3 days)
minimum_account_reuse_hours.label: Account Reuse Hours

recycle_on_jail.desc: Put jailed accounts back in rotation after cooldown
recycle_on_jail.label: Recycle Jailed

tuning.title: ⚙️ Account Tuning

db.dragonite.password.desc: Must match MYSQL_PASSWORD in .env - used by all services
db.dragonite.password.label: Database Password

db.dragonite.user.desc: Must match MYSQL_USER in .env - used by all services
db.dragonite.user.label: Database Username

koji.bearer_token.desc: Must match KOJI_SECRET in .env - used to access Koji geofences
koji.bearer_token.label: Koji Bearer Token

processors.golbat_api_secret.desc: Must match across configs - Dragonite/ReactMap use this to request data from Golbat
processors.golbat_api_secret.label: Golbat API Secret

processors.golbat_raw_bearer.desc: Must match across configs - Dragonite uses this to SEND data to Golbat
processors.golbat_raw_bearer.label: Golbat Raw Bearer
